channel.title: modeling on Abel Soares Siqueira
channel.description: Recent content in modeling on Abel Soares Siqueira

item.title: Demand of your art
item.description: On a previous video/blog post, I talked about production planning using an example of selling art on the beach. One simplification of that model was the assumption that everything that we build can be sold. You can check the pluto notebook html here or download the notebook here. I have an excert down here, but for more details, check the video. If you just want to skip to questions, click here.

item.title: Selling art on the beach
item.description: I just released a video about using mathematical modeling to solve a production planning with the thematic of selling your art on the beach. You can check the pluto notebook html here or download the notebook here. I have an excert down here, but for more details, check the video. In Brazil, a common joke between undergrad students (usually during exams) is that “maybe I should give up and go sell my art on the beach”.
